content:
# I successfully harvested 3 stone, which has now been added to the inventory alongside the 10 coal.
# With the required materials now in hand, I can proceed to craft the Stone Furnace.

# Step 7: Craft the Stone Furnace using the collected materials.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Craft one Stone Furnace.

# After crafting, I will check the inventory to confirm that the Stone Furnace has been added. 
print(f"Inventory after crafting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting.
